name: Lightning Bond
description: Casting Lightning Shield on an ally also casts an untalented version on Rehgar.

name: Stable Portal
description: Increases Portal duration by 50%.

name: Bird's Eye View
description: Permanently increase Raven Form's vision range by 25%. Activate to increase this bonus to 200% for 5 seconds.

name: The Master's Touch
description: Quest: Hit 30 enemy Heroes with Arcane Rift without dying. Reward: Permanently increases the damage dealt by 75 and cooldown reduction for hitting a Hero by 1 second.

name: Quickening
description: Reduces Portal cooldown by 50%.

name: Astral Projection
description: Increases Portal cast range by 50%.

name: Winds of Celerity
description: Increases Raven Form's Movement Speed bonus by 50%.

name: Invisibility
description: Stealth an allied Hero for 20 seconds. Stores up to 2 charges.

name: Composite Spear
description: Increases the range of Ancient Spear by 30% and increases Fury generated by 20.

name: Aftershock
description: Using Seismic Slam reduces its Fury cost by 50% for 2 seconds.

name: No Escape
description: Increases the Movement Speed bonus from using Basic and Heroic Abilities to 25%.

name: Ferocious Healing
description: Consume 20 Fury to heal 10% of Sonya's maximum Health.  Usable while Whirlwinding.

name: Life Funnel
description: Increases the healing of Whirlwind to 35%, tripled versus Heroes.

name: Live by the Sword
description: Increase the duration of Parry by 40%. If at least 4 Hero Basic Attacks are blocked with a single Parry, its cooldown is reduced by 2 seconds.

name: Repelling Strike
description: Enemies hit by Detainment Strike are knocked back 35% farther.

name: Glyph of Drain Life
description: Increases the cast range of Drain Life by 25%.

name: Devour the Frail
description: Drain Life deals 50% more damage to enemies below 50% Health.

name: Arcane Dynamo
description: Using a Basic Ability increases Kael'thas's Spell Power by 3% for 5 seconds, stacking up to 15%.

name: Fully Loaded
description: Reduce Minigun's cooldown by 5 seconds.

name: Bulwark
description: Increases the duration of Armor granted by Shadow Charge from 2 seconds to 4 seconds.

name: From the Shadows
description: Increases the cast range of Shadow Charge by 40%.

name: Speed Demon
description: Being Stunned or Rooted increases Diablo's Movement Speed by 30% for 5 seconds.

name: Demonic Strength
description: Once Overpower's stun expires, the target is slowed by 30% for 3 seconds.

name: Soul Feast
description: Black Soulstone increases Diablo's Health Regeneration by 0.4 per second per Soul.

name: Soul Shield
description: Black Soulstone grants Diablo 0.25 Spell Armor per soul, reducing Ability Damage taken by 0.25% per Soul.

name: Fire Devil
description: Fire Stomp increases Diablo's Basic Attack damage by 20% and surrounds Diablo in flames that deal 20 (+4% per level) damage every second. Lasts 6 seconds.

name: Fearful Presence
description: Activate to reduce the damage dealt by nearby enemy Heroes by 30% for 3 seconds. Passive: Heroes and Summons that attack Diablo have their Attack Speed slowed by 20% for 2.5 seconds.

name: Blossom Swell
description: Increases Noxious Blossom's radius by 20%.

name: Photosynthesis
description: Crippling Spores returns 10 Mana per enemy hit, up to 40 Mana.

name: Cruel Spores
description: When Crippling Spores hits only Minions or Mercenaries, its cooldown is reduced by 80% and 20 Mana is restored.

name: Nimble Wisp
description: Increases Wisp Movement Speed by 100% and vision radius by 50%.

name: Timelost Wisp
description: Wisp costs no Mana and its cooldown recharges 125% faster while no Wisp is active.

name: Skybound Wisp
description: Wisp can see over obstacles and reveals the area for 4 seconds after dying.

name: Dividing Wisp
description: The first time a Wisp is relocated, it leaves a copy of itself in the previous location.

name: Siphoning Toxin
description: As long as Nature's Toxin is active on an enemy, heal 18 (+4% per level) Health a second.

name: Nature's Culling
description: Increases Nature's Toxin's damage by 150% to non-Heroes.

name: Pestering Blossom
description: Increases Noxious Blossom's range by 50%.

name: Giant Killer
description: Basic Attacks against enemy Heroes deal bonus damage equal to 1.5% of the Hero's maximum Health.

name: Choking Pollen
description: Increases Noxious Blossom damage by 125% against enemies afflicted with Nature's Toxin.

name: Let Them Wither
description: Increases Crippling Spores' slow to 50% and causes it to no longer decay.

name: Abolish Magic
description: Target an Ally to remove all damage over time and disabling effects from them and Lunara. For 2 seconds after, the duration of disabling effects is reduced by 50%.
